page.title: 10Housing in Enniskillen.
page.content: There are two main types of house ownership, private (owned by a particular person) & public (owned by Housing Executive.)Recently tenants in public housing can purchase their home at special rates, depending on the length of tenancy. Looking at estates like Derrychara or Chanterhill it is easy to recognise houses bought by their new renovations & improved appearance. There are a variety of houses & sizes - 3 bedroom 4 unit terraced blocks, 2 bedroom pensioner bungalows, 4 bedroom semi-detached & 2 storey blocks of flats. In the private sector most homes are modern bungalows, some split level, semi-detached & detached all with modern amenities in their own grounds. In rural areas there is a good standard of farm house. Many house holders qualify for improvement grants
